named-query.name: MeteringPoint.findAll
named-query.query: select m from MeteringPoint m LEFT JOIN m.loadInfo l

named-query.name: MeteringPoint.findByExternalCode
named-query.query: select t from MeteringPoint t where t.externalCode=:externalCode

named-query.name: HourMeteringDataRaw.findByEntity
named-query.query: select m from HourMeteringDataRaw m where m.externalCode=:externalCode and m.meteringDate=:meteringDate and m.hour=:hour and m.dataSourceCode=:dataSourceCode and m.wayEntering=:wayEntering and m.status=:status and m.unitCode=:unitCode and m.paramCode=:paramCode

named-query.name: DayMeteringBalanceRaw.findByEntity
named-query.query: select m from DayMeteringBalanceRaw m where m.externalCode=:externalCode and m.meteringDate=:meteringDate and m.dataSourceCode=:dataSourceCode and m.wayEntering=:wayEntering and m.status=:status and m.unitCode=:unitCode and m.paramCode=:paramCode
